v1.0, 1013-03-01 -- Initial release.
v1.0.1           -- Maybe the package works now :-D
v1.0.2           -- Taboo characters
v1.0.4           -- Replaced taboo character system for skip_html
v1.1.0           -- A rewrite for most part. Simplified the code and fixed some bugs.
v1.1.1           -- A forced hyphenation for long consonant lines.
v1.1.2           -- Fixed a bug in skip_html. Refactoring. Starting to look good :)
v1.1.4           -- Fixed some fatal bugs that got in with the refactoring.
v1.1.5           -- Made the skip_html still hyphenate words that are next to a html tag. Also created a test suite.
